style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;direction=north;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="130" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-12" value="数据位" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="168" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-13" value="r" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="60" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-14" value="r-1" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="58" width="40" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-15" value="" style="shape=partialRectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;top=0;bottom=0;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="90" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-16" value="······" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="600" y="88" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-17" value="2" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="60" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-18" value="1" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="60" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-19" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;direction=north;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="130" width="270" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-20" value="校验码" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="585" y="168" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-21" value="CRC代码格式" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="208" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-22" value="（信息码）" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="190" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-23" value="由信息码产生，位数越长，校验能力越强" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="505" y="190" width="240" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5sW93slUTP0IGcpoWnlD-25" value="n是CRC码的字长" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="40" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-2" value="创建型设计模式" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="707.5" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-3" value="" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_2;align=left;labelPosition=right;pointerEvents=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="505" width="50" height="465" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-5" value="类" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="415" y="490" width="75" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-6" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="490" y="505" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="550" y="505" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-7" value="工厂方法模式<br>Factory Method" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="470" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-9" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="615" y="440" width="45" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-14" value="<font color="#ff0000">定义一个用于创建对象的接口，让子类决定实例化哪一个类</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="420" width="340" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-15" value="当一个类不知道它所必须创建的对象的类的时候" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="470" width="280" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-16" value="当一个类希望由它的子类来指定它所创建的对象的时候" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="505" width="310" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-17" value="当类将创建对象的职责委托给多个帮助子类中的某一个，并且你希望将哪一个帮助子类是代理者这一信息局部化的时候" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="550" width="650" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-18" value="对象" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="960" width="75" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-20" value="" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.annotation_2;align=left;labelPosition=right;pointerEvents=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="495" y="741.25" width="55" height="467.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-21" value="抽象工厂模式 Abstract Factory" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="718.75" width="110" height="37.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-22" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="677.5" width="20" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-23" value="<font color="#ff0000">提供一个创建一系列相关或相互依赖对象的接口，而无须指定它们具体的类</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="660" width="420" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-24" value="一个系统要独立于它的产品的创建、组合和表示时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="690" width="290" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-25" value="一个系统要由多个产品系列中的一个来配置时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="718.75" width="260" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-26" value="当要强调一系列相关的产品对象的设计以使进行联合使用时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="748.75" width="340" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-27" value="当提供一个产品类库，只想显示它们的接口而不是实现时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="778.75" width="320" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-28" value="生成器模式<br>Builder" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="880" width="110" height="37.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-29" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="838.75" width="20" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-30" value="<font color="#ff0000">将一个复杂对象的构建与它的表示分离，使得同样的构建过程可以有不同的表示</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="821.25" width="440" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-32" value="当创建复杂对象的算法应该独立于该对象的组成部分以及它们的装配方式时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="883.75" width="420" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-34" value="当构建过程必须允许被构造对象有不同表示时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="940" width="260" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-35" value="原型模式<br>Prototype" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="1038.75" width="110" height="37.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-36" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="997.5" width="20" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-37" value="<font color="#ff0000">用原型实例指定创建对象的种类，并且通过复制这些原型创建新的对象</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="980" width="400" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-38" value="当一个系统应该独立于它的创建、构成和表示时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="1010" width="280" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-39" value="当要实例化的类是在运行时刻指定时，如动态加载" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="1038.75" width="290" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-40" value="为了避免创建一个产品类层次平行的工厂类层次时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="1068.75" width="290" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-41" value="当一个类的实例只能有几个不同状态组合中的一种时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="1098.75" width="300" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-49" value="单例模式<br>Singleton" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="1191.25" width="110" height="37.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-50" value="" style="shape=curlyBracket;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;labelPosition=left;verticalLabelPosition=middle;align=right;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="1150" width="20" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-51" value="<font color="#ff0000">保证一个类只有一个实例并提供一个访问它的全局访问点</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="1140" width="320" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-52" value="当类只能有一个实例而且客户可以从一个众所周知的访问点访问它时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="675" y="1195" width="380" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ZuUFiFBS3KCM3belht6m-54" value="当这个唯一实例应该是通过子类化可扩展的，并且客户无须更改就能使用一个扩展的实例时" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="1251.25" width="500" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
